meanings.sent1: The murderess was caught red-handed with the weapon.
meanings.sent2: The town was shocked to discover the identity of the murderess.
meanings.sent3: The murderess tried to blame the crime on her pet cat, but no one believed her.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held the cold, calculating gaze of a murderess.
meanings.sent5: The chilling presence of the murderess lingered in the room long after she had left.
